name: Accel World vs. Sword Art Online: Millennium Twilight
name_original: Accel World vs. Sword Art Online: Millennium Twilight
description: Accel World vs. Sword Art Online - the virtual and accelerated worlds have collided! Svart Alfheim and the Accelerated World have begun to merge, and in the midst of the chaos, Yui has gone missing. Join Kirito and over 40 playable characters as they must challenge the Seven Kings of pure color from the Accelerated World to gain access to her location. Players from both groups come together in a war of the worlds where the strongest Burst Linkers and ALO Players are on a mission to save Yui from the hands of Persona Vabel.
